price: Na wale ambao wanapo kumbushwa Ishara za Mola wao Mlezi hawajifanyi viziwi nazo, na vipofu.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ لَمۡ يَخِرُّواْ عَلَيۡهَا صُمّٗا وَعُمۡيَانٗا
footnotes: Na katika sifa zao ni kuwa mwenye kuwaidhi akiwapa mawaidha, na akawasomea Aya za Mwenyezi Mungu, humwelekea kumsikiliza, na nyoyo zao zikawaidhika, na macho yao hufunuka. Wala hawawi kama wale ambao wanatapatapa wanapo yasikia, wanapuuza, masikio yao hayapenyi kitu, wala macho yao hayafumbuki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā dhukkirū biāyāti rabbihim lam yakhirrū ʿalayhā ṣumman waʿum'yānan
